name: Jaga
description:
You are Jaga, a young man entrusted with the task of finding a cure for your younger brother before his time runs out.

Race through the ancient villages, jungles and temples of India, in 4 levels, to save your brother.

Controls:
Move: Right and Left Arrow Keys
Jump: Space bar
Interact with environment: E

Credits:
After 2 and a half years of development we, the students of Isha Home School Video Game Development Club, have finished our first ever long term project: JAGA.
